title: Forgotten/Under appreciated Champs

embed.description: Statistics for the most popular League of Legends champions, bans, bottom/mid/top lane synergy and matchups, and win rates.

body:
Sion was unused for a while for a lot of players including me. but ever since his remake Ive been loving him in Jungle... but what about the other champions that have lost the love of the players?

For me it has to be {{champion:83}} , ever since season 2 he hasnt been the same.
We need remakes of other champs that havent changed since season 1 to adapt to the new style of League.

What do you guys think?

replies.body:
I agree that some champions do indeed need remakes such as Yorick and Taric (and Morde maybe?) as thay are outdated visually and their kits are a little weak in modern league and are also quite boring to use (e.g. Taric stuns a target, runs up to it and presses w and r). Last time I heard, these champions where being looked but the specifics are uncertain. 

Others just need changes to single abilities like as previously mentioned, Galio and Quinn. It so happens I main Galio (full support tank) and Quinn (bot lane ADC) simply because they are underused and I like to show players that they can be used effectively and are viable picks in many situations. 

Quinn is fun to use but is one of, if not the riskiest ADC to pick (the fact that she has to get into melee range to access her full damage potential) and can be shut down by most of the meta support picks which is why she is not picked. A reset on vault after she secures a kill WHILST HER ULT IS ACTIVE and a much lower ult cooldown in the early stages of the game will improve her early snowballing (which is much needed as she loses power in the mid game if not fed, making it hard to reach late game where Quinn becomes scary) and clean up potential whilst ult is active making getting in close more rewarding. This should entice more players to pick Quinn.

Galio is the opposite. Players comment on how boring he is (the main reason he isn't picked) but his kit is really strong. Atm Galio could use a new passive as he can become very oppressive against AP champions but quite weak against AD champions which is strange as he has an AoE taunt forcing players to basic attack him. His basic attack is also quite lame for a melee champion. Maybe a 2 part passive that gives bonus AP based on 25% of MR and 15% armour and also every 3 abilities that Galio suffers damage from, his next basic attack does extra damage or something like that. 

I'd just like to see underused champions still being picked as they add certain elements to each game which are exciting rather than seeing the same champions each game.

I feel like Brand has been forgotten, I don't play him a lot and I don't really like him but I feel like there's been no changes to him. Not even the slightest.
Same to GP and Galio.
{{champion:63}}  is amazing and never needs to be changed :D He actually has a significant amount of gameplay, especially in higher elo solo que.
